picklistValues.masterLabel: Assists with preparation of logical metadata packages with depedencies
Automate Unit Tests by running code coverage only on dependent Test Classes
Code quality check
Completely driven by GUI
Constructive and Destructive changes can be packaged into one commit
Create feature templates for nCino with dependencies across sObjects
Creation of templates to support pre/post deployment activities
Delta Deployments for nested metadata components
Dependent records across multiple objects can be migrated with no limit on #records
Deploy nCino templates (w/ dependencies) from either Salesforce Org or Version Control
Deploy specific work items (with dependencies) to higher environments that have passed testing
Help users achieve CD faster than any other release management platform
Leverage an existing build to re-deploy into other environments
Out-of-Box Integrations with commonly used tools like JIRA, GIT, etc.
Record the Metadata Configuration and nCino records in a branch
Recurrent metadata check-ins
Rollback the package either completely or selectively upon successful deployment
Run Pre/Post Destructive Changes during Rollback to avoid dependency errors
Salesforce users can collaborate on their metadata changes"
Schedule Data Loads or Integrate with metadata deployment
Schedule deployments (daily, weekly, webhook-based) with pre/post deployment tasks
Sensitive records masked during migration
Supports Lookup, Master-Detail, Junction objects, Self References
Supports all conflict resolution types - Ours, Theirs, Recursive and Fast Forward
Supports creation of contextual Scratch orgs and Second Generation packaging (Unlocked Packages)
Tag work items during deployments
Templates can be run separately or tagged with CI Jobs
Validate/Test a user story prior to a push
Version and deploy Vlocity datapacks with dependencies to reduce deployment times
Visualize every day CI/CD operations and be able to generate reports on a daily/weekly/monthly basis
